entry.title: IN EFFECT, Bay Roberts
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:30 PM NDT Wednesday 01 December 0

entry.title: Saturday: Showers. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Showers this morning. Rain and fog beginning this afternoon. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High plus 5. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 07:27 AM NDT Saturday 28 May 2016

entry.title: Saturday night: Rain mixed with snow. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Rain becoming mixed with snow overnight. Fog. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northeast 30 gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along exposed areas of the coast overnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 07:27 AM NDT Saturday 28 May 2016

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries or rain showers. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries or rain showers ending in the morning then clearing. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along exposed areas of the coast in the morning. Wind becoming north 20 in the afternoon. High plus 5. Forecast issued 07:27 AM NDT Saturday 28 May 2016

entry.title: Sunday night: Cloudy periods. Low zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low zero. Forecast issued 07:27 AM NDT Saturday 28 May 2016

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 18. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. High 18. Forecast issued 07:27 AM NDT Saturday 28 May 2016

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 07:27 AM NDT Saturday 28 May 2016
